mapper.select: SELECT a.dona_num , a.dona_tit , a.dona_tit_sub , a.dona_con , a.dona_start_yy , a.dona_start_mm , a.dona_start_dd , a.dona_end_yy , a.dona_end_mm , a.dona_end_dd , a.hope_money , ((b.dona_money/a.hope_money)*100) as hope FROM d_detail a , (select x.dona_num , sum(x.dona_money) as dona_money from D_LIST x where x.dona_num = #{dona_num} group by x.dona_num) b WHERE a.dona_num = b.dona_num(+) and a.dona_num = #{dona_num}
select b.sq , b.dona_num , b.dona_tit , b.member_email , b.dona_money , b.dona_date_yy , b.dona_date_mm , b.dona_date_dd from d_list b where b.dona_num = #{dona_num}
select distinct dona_num , sum(dona_money) as dona_money from d_list where dona_num = #{dona_num} group by dona_num
select count(distinct member_email) as member_email , sum(dona_money) as dona_money from d_list
select * from d_detail order by dona_num asc

SELECT a.dona_num , a.dona_tit , a.dona_tit_sub , a.dona_con , a.dona_start_yy , a.dona_start_mm , a.dona_start_dd , a.dona_end_yy , a.dona_end_mm , a.dona_end_dd , a.hope_money , ((b.dona_money/a.hope_money)*100) as hope , b.dona_money FROM d_detail a , (select x.dona_num , sum(x.dona_money) as dona_money from D_LIST x group by x.dona_num) b WHERE a.dona_num = b.dona_num(+)
select member_email , sum(money) as money from member_money where member_email = #{member_email} group by member_email
